name: smugmug-retrieve
description: SmugMug Asset Retrieval System - Migrate photos and videos from SmugMug to BackBlaze B2 with metadata preservation

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=backend & npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend

author: John
